data.actual_result: The border doesn't change size. It remains in the same ratio.
data.expected_result: Like all other elements, the border also changes it's size in the same ratio as the others.
data.short_description: The border around the statuses of people is doesn't adjust size in the autocomplete menu.
data.steps_to_repro: -  Type @ in a channel you have permission to type in. - Observe the statuses of people in the autocomplete menu.
